scripts.build: yarn build:es && yarn build:cjs && yarn build-throttled:es && yarn build-throttled:cjs
scripts.build:es: rimraf dist/es && mkdir -p dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src/index.js --out-file dist/es/index.js
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && mkdir -p dist/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src/index.js --out-file dist/cjs/index.js
scripts.build-throttled:es: rimraf throttled/es && mkdir -p throttled/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src/throttled.js --out-file throttled/es/index.js
scripts.build-throttled:cjs: rimraf throttled/cjs && mkdir -p throttled/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src/throttled.js --out-file throttled/cjs/index.js
scripts.watch:es: rimraf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src -w --out-dir dist/es
